page.title: 10RURAL LIFE
page.content: In this block there are no restaurants, hotels or cafes and people wishing these facilities have to travel to Inverness. The children in the school (and most parents) didn't feel that these things were essential and that their quality of life was enhanced by living in the country. None of the children thought they would prefer to live in a town or city, the reasons being it was less healthy and more dangerous (road accidents). Most children enjoyed the freedom of having plenty of space to play and had in fact spent most of their lives in a rural area. It was thought that as they got older they may wish to spend more time in Inverness, and that this could be a problem due to the lack of public transport.
